alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Crook; Northern Campbell; Western Crook (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 03 at 8:31PM MST until January 04 at 11:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Portions of northwestern and southwestern South Dakota and northeast Wyoming. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Pine Ridge Reservation. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures below freezing may allow some icing on untreated surfaces as well as frost on elevated surfaces.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Crook; Northern Campbell; Western Crook
